about-us.story: ယူကေစိန်၏ ဇာတ်လမ်း
about-us.over-the-year: လွန်ခဲ့သော နှစ်များအတွင်း
about-us.card1: Founded by U Thein Zaw and Daw Wai Wai Myint in 2004, Pantanaw UK SEIN began its journey with a deep commitment to preserving and promoting the art of traditional mat craftsmanship of Myanmar. Starting with mat production, the business has been dedicated to supporting local artisans and establishing a mat craftsmanship factory, innovating the traditional mat linning by hand to the machine. Building on this foundation, Pantanaw UK SEIN expanded its offerings to include a wide range of high-quality rattan items. Our dedication to craftsmanship and sustainability has positioned Pantanaw UK SEIN in the handcrafted goods industry of Pantanaw.
about-us.card2: The UK SEIN Online Shop was established during the COVID-19 pandemic as a response to the boredom experienced during lockdowns. Initially, the business began by casually posting photos of handmade rattan mats online. The positive response and increasing sales from these posts prompted a shift towards a more serious business start. As the demand for these products grew, the shop expanded its operations, focusing on creating a structured and sustainable business model.
about-us.card3: With the significant increase in sales through the online shop, the decision was made to open a physical store to further expand the UK SEIN. In addition to the existing product offerings, the store began selling rattan items and mats, which helped diversify the product range. To cater to specific customer needs, the business also introduced customised items, allowing for a more personalised shopping experience. Furthermore, the decision to market and sell furniture, particularly fiber furniture, opened new opportunities for growth. Eventually, the business started stocking and selling rattan chairs and tables, further enhancing its market presence. Currently, UK SEIN operates four physical stores in Yangon and has one additional store, along with a mat factory, located in Pantanaw.

portfolio.how-we-work: အလုပ်လုပ်ပုံ
portfolio.discover-our-elegance: Our products combine elegance and eco-friendliness, with each piece thoughtfully crafted using high-quality raw materials to ensure exceptional customer satisfaction. Visit our physical stores or shop online for a truly excellent shopping experience.
portfolio.to-expand: စျေးဝယ်သည်များကို ပို၍စွဲမက်ဖွယ်ကောင်းသော အတွေ့အကြုံကို ကမ်းလှန်းရန်နှင့် တည်ရှိမှုကိုပို၍ သိသာစေရန်။
portfolio.our-recent-projects: လက်တလောဆောက်ရွက်ထားသော ပရောဂျက်များ
portfolio.portfolio-card: Introducing our latest furniture project, the "EcoHarmony Collection," where modern design meets sustainability. This groundbreaking line features an array of stylish, eco-friendly furniture crafted from sustainable materials like reclaimed wood and recycled metals. Each piece is meticulously designed to offer exceptional durability and comfort, ensuring that your home not only looks beautiful but also supports a healthier planet. From elegant dining sets to cozy sofas, the EcoHarmony Collection embodies a perfect balance of form and function. Our commitment to green practices means that every item in this collection is created with minimal environmental impact, using energy-efficient processes and eco-friendly finishes.
portfolio.what-do-we-care: ကျွန်တော်တို့ဘာကို ဂရုစိုက်ပါသလဲ?

discount-banner.seasonal: ရာသီအလိုက်
discount-banner.transform-your-home: သင်၏အိမ်ကို ယခုရာသီအတွက်သာ သီးသန့် ပရိဘောဂများဖြင့် ပြောင်းလဲလိုက်ပါ။ ပစ္စည်းများကို ၃၀% လျှော့စျေးအပြင် ကျက်သရေရှိမှု၊ သက်တောင့်သက်သာရှိမှု နှင့် ခံနိုင်ရည်ရှိမှုတို့ကို ဝယ်ယူလိုက်ပါ။ ဧည့်ခန်းအတွက်ပဲဖြစ်ဖြစ် အိပ်ခန်းအတွက်ပဲဖြစ်ဖြစ် ပြောင်းလဲမှုလုပ်ချင်ရင် အခုချိန်က အကောင်းဆုံးအချိန်ပါပဲ။ မြန်မြန်သာဝယ်ယူလိုက်ပါ discount တွေကခဏပဲကြာမှာ။
discount-banner.save-up-to-40: ပတ်ဝန်းကျင်နဲ့ သင့်လျှော်သောပစ္စည်းနဲ့ ဘယ်တော့မဆိုလှပတင့်တယ့်နေမည့် ဒီဇိုင်းများဖြင့် ပြုလုပ်ထားသည့် ထိန်တန်းပစ္စည်းများကို ၄၀% လျှော့စျေးဖြင့်ဝယ်ယူလိုက်ပါ။ သင့်ရဲ့အိမ်ကို ပြောင်းလဲဖို့လိုအပ်တယ် သက်တောင့်သက်သာရှိသော ဆိုဖာ၊ ဖက်ရှင်ကျသော မီးဖိုချောင်သုံးပစ္စည်းများ အပြင် လိုတာများကို ရှာဖွေဝယ်ယူလိုက်ပါ။
